name: Unfinished Business (DEMO)
description:
THERE IS NO SOUND DON'T TRY TO CHECK THE SOUND

You play as a ghost who is trying to pass on to the afterlife. This demo takes place in the library, where you are trying to learn more about your situation and how to pass on. You can possess people and they will help you get through all the rooms to the end. Have fun!

Controls:

WASD: Movement (W to climb up ladders, hold S to drop through bookcases)

Space: Jump

F: Possess

Left Click: Possessed Ability (throwing a book)

Esc: Toggle Menu
